item.description:
We saw the preview at "The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel" (which is playing the following week at Cinestudio, if you have not already seen it) and several persons decided it would be a good movie to see. Directed by Wes Anderson, the cast includes Edward Norton, Bruce Willis, Bill Murray, Harvey Keitel, Tilda Swinton, Frances McDormand, Jason Schwartzman. Set in the 1960's, it is the story of the inhabitants of a small New England island hunting for a young boy and girl who fall in love and run away together. (94 mins)

Details, trailer, etc. - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1748122/

 

NOTE:  This was originally on Friday, I moved the date to accommodate the Wadsworth's "Summer Sizzle under the Stars" series.  The movie shows all weekend, if enough people prefer a Saturday or Sunday showing I'll move it again but I think people prefer to be out and about if possible on summer weekends.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "Moonrise Kingdom" @ Cinestudio
